title: A$AP Rocky, Playboi Carti, and Peso Pluma Headlining Rolling Loud California 2025
description: Sexyy Red, Bossman Dlow, Ken Carson, and more will also participate in the Inglewood music festival
author: Matthew Strauss
excerpt: Sexyy Red, Bossman Dlow, Ken Carson, and more will also participate in the Inglewood music festival
text: The lineup for the California edition of Rolling Loud has been announced. The music festival takes place in Inglewood on March 15 and 16. Headlining the first night is A$AP Rocky, and Playboi Carti will headline the second night. Mexican singer Peso Pluma has also been announced as a headliner. Elsewhere on the bill are: Sexyy Red, Bossman Dlow, Ken Carson, Lazer Dim 700, Ab-Soul, TiaCorine, Kamaiyah, Loe Shimmy, Blxst, 03 Greedo, and Tee Grizzley. See the full lineup below.Playboi Carti recently headlined Rolling Loud Miami, where he debuted some new music. He is continuing to tease the release a new album that may be called I Am Music.All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.Rolling Loud California 2025
html:
The lineup for the California edition of Rolling Loud has been announced. The music festival takes place in Inglewood on March 15 and 16. Headlining the first night is A$AP Rocky, and Playboi Carti will headline the second night. Mexican singer Peso Pluma has also been announced as a headliner. Elsewhere on the bill are: Sexyy Red, Bossman Dlow, Ken Carson, Lazer Dim 700, Ab-Soul, TiaCorine, Kamaiyah, Loe Shimmy, Blxst, 03 Greedo, and Tee Grizzley. See the full lineup below.

Playboi Carti recently headlined Rolling Loud Miami, where he debuted some new music. He is continuing to tease the release a new album that may be called I Am Music.

All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Rolling Loud California 2025
